info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Thomas County through 700 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Colby, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Colby around 635 PM CDT. Gem around 650 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 52 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
